argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ptcls.2 | |- J = ( Xt_ ` ( k e. A |-> R ) ) |
| 2 |  | ptcls.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 3 |  | ptcls.j | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> R e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 4 |  | ptcls.c | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> S C_ X ) |
| 5 |  | #P_toponmax | |- ( R e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> X e. R ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. R ) |
| 7 | 6, 4 | #P_ssexd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> S e. _V ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. k e. A S e. _V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_iunexg | |- ( ( A e. V /\ A. k e. A S e. _V ) -> U_ k e. A S e. _V ) |
| 10 | 2, 8, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> U_ k e. A S e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_axac3 | |- CHOICE |
| 12 |  | #P_acacni | |- ( ( CHOICE /\ A e. V ) -> AC_ A = _V ) |
| 13 | 11, 2, 12 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> AC_ A = _V ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> U_ k e. A S e. AC_ A ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 14 | #P_ptclsg | |- ( ph -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` X_ k e. A S ) = X_ k e. A ( ( cls ` R ) ` S ) ) |
